title: Rav Moshe Hillel Hirsch Visits Prison
body: Rav Moshe Hillel Hirsch heads to Prison No. 10 to deliver a shiur klali in solidarity with Ariel Shamai, a yeshiva bochur from Yeshiva Ateres Shlomo, who was arrested and sparking a major protest outside the prison gates.

title: Yeshiva Bochur Released Early
body: Rabbi Ariel Rosenzweig, a yeshiva bochur from Yeshiva Neve Eretz in Be'er Yaakov, was released from Israeli military prison after public outcry and pressure from the Degel HaTorah party, where he was sitting shivah for his father.

title: Rav Yaakov Bender's Urgent Warning
body: Rav Yaakov Bender, Rosh Yeshiva of Yeshiva Darchei Torah, urges caution after a fatal car crash that killed four yeshiva students, pleading with the community to drive with greater care and vigilance.
